title: Bug 11866: Incorrect Labels in Update Test Suite Dialog
description: Incorrect labels in the Update Test Suite dialog.
OB:
In the Update Test Suite dialog:
- "Test Classes to be included" is written as "TestClasses" (missing space).
- The status line incorrectly talks about methods being selected instead of types.
- The action name is written together as "TestSuite" instead of "Test Suite."
EB:
The expected behavior is that the labels in the Update Test Suite dialog should be correctly written and formatted. Specifically:
- The label "Test Classes to be included" should include the space and be written as it is.
- The status line should correctly refer to types being selected, not methods.
- The action name should be written as "Test Suite" with a space.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the Update Test Suite dialog.
2. Observe the incorrect labels and descriptions as mentioned in the observed behavior.
